list.query: from(bucket: "sensiot")   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity" or r["_field"] == "temperature")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_eui"] == "dcf069cccd8a91a2")   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)   |> yield(name: "mean")

list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.query: from(bucket: "sensiot")   |> range(start: -6h)   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensor_data")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature" or r._field == "humidity")

targets.query: from(bucket: "sensiot") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensor_data" and r._field == "temperature")
from(bucket: "sensiot") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensor_data" and r._field == "humidity")
